Articles.Content:
Hi there, I have the project to create a new tech tree, mods included as i can.

There was the Milestone Tech tree, which let you to begin with probe and do science with it. After that manned pod was available. Anyway, if you dont push your developpement to the manned pod, you can unlock cockpit and plane node, etc .. It was more realistic.

The only matter is there's no plugin to modify tech tree ingame directly, one solution at this time is to write a tech tree.cfg ... So if you're interrested and want to purpose your help, we need a plugin to change that, some developers hear me ?
I heard you 10 days ago.

I appreciate it Mcflyyy lol..

I'm not a developper, tried modeling some time before on blender..

But i have time to this project
I'm working on the tree, I've one question about, icon, how can i make a new icon for the tech tree ? not about the design (png, format..) but for linking this in the cfg, and directory ?
